document_data.caption: Heroes' Height in the southern part of modern-day Sossal.
document_data.name: Heroes' Height
document_data.mainbody: '''Heroes' Height''' was a broad mountaintop in southern [[Sossal]] in the [[Cold Lands]] of [[northeast Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: Heroes' Height stood in southern Sossal, {{SI|200|mile|k|long=yes}} west of the [[Icerim Mountains]], and {{SI|100|mile|k|long=yes}} south of the settlement of [[Dharvil]].
document_data.History: It was on this mountaintop that the last [[dwarves]] of [[Dareth]] and [[white dragon]]s of [[Hoarfaern]] destroyed each other in a climactic battle in {{YearlinkName|-318}}.
